DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card on the bottom of your deck.
Entangled prevents you from attacking for a turn.
Frozen cards unfreeze when played instead of their normal effect.
When you attack an enemy with Mines, deal damage equal to the amount of Mines, and take damage equal to 20% of the amount of Mines.
Gains Block at the end of each turn. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces Plated Armor by 1.
Whenever you play an Attack, draw 1 card and lose 1 Swim.
